title: EP 126: CODEPENDENCY ISN'T JUST AN AA THING, DID YOU KNOW THAT?
description: This week I explore codependency. I've always thought it was a thing only Alcoholics dealt with, but it's so much more! 15 Signs you may be a codependent (a list I found on the internet). Samantha writes in asking for advice - her internship is killing her and her relationship. What should she do? A depressed college student doesn't know how to ask for help. We get our lives on this episode in a very deep way, bros!
author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)
